entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening.
